name: XPOLAR
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
XPOLAR is the governance token for the Polaris DEX built on Aurora. It can be used to vote on proposals and steer the direction of the protocol. 

The total supply of XPOLAR is capped at 4 million tokens, 1 million of which is allocated to the founding members, core developers, advisers, and investors. The rest are being distributed to the community through liquidity mining.
